summary.Title: Forklift driver to warehouse in Brøndby
summary.JobHeadline: Forklift driver to warehouse in Brøndby
summary.Presentation: We are looking for forklift driver to work in warehouse located I Brøndby. Job is picking costumer orders by reach truck or stabler and helping around the warehouse where it is needed.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Forklift driver to warehouse in Brøndby
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for forklift driver to work in warehouse located I Brøndby. Job is picking costumer orders by reach truck or stabler and helping around the warehouse where it is needed.

Working hours are between 14:00-22:00 and 22:00-06:30 Monday to Sunday with 1 optional day off

Requirements:

  • You can work from as soon as possible
  • You speak Danish and/or English and a communicative level
  • Safety shoes is required by the employer
  • A valid forklift certificate (EU or danish version)

Also you must have the ability to work independently in a team with one supervisor and be ready to learn the clients IT system. You will of course have training on the first shift.

As an employee at HumanizeR, you have the freedom to choose the shifts that fits your schedule and take the days off that you need.

>> APPLY JOB HERE <<

Please make sure to upload the following:

  • Criminal record
  • National picture ID (if you´re from EU)
  • Work permit (if you´re from outside the EU)

Note that due to the Personal Data law, we do not receive CVs and applications by email, so please apply on link.above.

If you have any questions regarding the job, feel free to call us 8:00-15:00 on weekdays 53531199

Looking forward hearing from you.
